name: Labyrinth (itch) (Scott Topping)
description:
Labyrinth is a 3D puzzle game inspired by marble maze puzzles.

How to play?

Move the mouse to control the rotation of the platform, guiding the green ball to the end of the level

This game was made for Unity Game Jam and is defiantly the most polished game jam entry Ive completed by my self.

Theres one major bug that I'm having at the moment, the ball tends to fall through the platform if you hit it too fast. I can't for the life of me figure out how to fix it, so if you've got any ideas please let me know!

Overall I'm pretty happy with how this game has turned out so far and am planning to continue working on it for a bit longer and look into releasing it for Android and iOS :)

Music - https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/jazz-comedy
